sentences.english: The joints of the wood were overlapped and cramped.
sentences.chinese: 這些木頭的接頭處被疊在一起，用鐵箍固定。

sentences.english: The packing of our men’s shirts is each in a polybag, 5 dozen to a carton lined with waterproof paper and bound with two iron straps outside.
sentences.chinese: 內襯防潮紙，外打鐵箍兩道。

sentences.english: You must reinforce the packing with metal straps.
sentences.chinese: 你們必需用鐵箍加固包裝。

sentences.english: Packed in wooden cases iron hooped at both ends .
sentences.chinese: 木箱裝，兩端用鐵箍圍住。

sentences.english: we plan to use cardboard boxes with iron straps for reinforcement.
sentences.chinese: 我方準備使用紙盒子，外打鐵箍進行加固。

sentences.english: You goods will be packed in wooden cases with tin-lining and iron hoops.
sentences.chinese: 你們的貨物將用內襯錫紙外加鐵箍的木箱包裝。

sentences.english: The worker repaired the barrel with a hoop iron.
sentences.chinese: 這個工人用一個鐵箍修桶。

sentences.english: You must reinforce the phvacking with metnos straps.
sentences.chinese: 你們必需用鐵箍加固包裝。

sentences.english: Our ancestors never used cramps to secure their masonry.
sentences.chinese: 我們的祖先從沒有用鐵箍來固定磚石建築。

sentences.english: Packed on Wooden Pallet Bound with Four Iron Belts Externally and Packing Sound.
sentences.chinese: 木托盤裝，外扎四道鐵箍，包裝完好。

sentences.english: You goods will be packed in wooden cases with tin-lining and iron hoops.
sentences.chinese: 貴方的貨物將用木箱包裝，內襯錫板，外用鐵箍加固。
